AttachmentsNamespaces.description: The namespaces in which this extension should be enabled.

AttachmentsChunkListByLetter.description: Boolean, whether or not the attachment list should be chunked by the first letter of list items. Defaults to true.

AttachmentsShowSubpageForm.description: Boolean, whether or not the subpage form should be shown. Defaults to true.

AttachmentsShowLinkForm.description: Boolean, whether or not a link to the attachments should be shown in the namespaces (page, discussion). Defaults to true.

AttachmentsShowInNamespaces.description: Boolean, whether or not an 'add attachments' link should be shown in the views (read, edit source, view history). Defaults to true.

AttachmentsShowInViews.description: Boolean, whether or not a button should be shown in the views (read, edit source, view history). Defaults to true.

AttachmentsShowEmptySection.description: Boolean, whether or not to show certain elements when there are no attachments for a page. Defaults to true.
